intent_atoms.description: MappedReader must use Data(...,.mappedIfSafe) with bounds-checked slices
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow

functional_units.name: MappedReader Implementation
functional_units.description: Provides a Data reader that uses mappedIfSafe with bounds-checked slices for efficient data access.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests Execution on macOS
functional_units.description: Runs SwiftUI automation tests to validate end-to-end streaming selection flow in the UI.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark on macOS
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-based UI while maintaining CLI throughput parity.

functional_units.name: Session Persistence Error Surfacing
functional_units.description: Displays session persistence errors once diagnostics plumbing is available.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Bookmark Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconciles CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities according to defined rules.

functional_units.name: Automation via Apple Events for Notarized Builds
functional_units.description: Evaluates and extends entitlements for automation using Apple Events in notarized builds.
